Diankou Sembene, bụ onye Senegal na-eme ihe nkiri. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ dịka 'Maazị Ndiaye' na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya karịrị nke mmadụ bụ Atlantics
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Sembene maka ihe nkiri Atlantics nke Mati Diop duziri dịka ihe nkiri mbụ ya. Ihe nkiri ahụ nwere mmalite ya n'isi obodo Dakar tupu ewepụta ya na Senegal
Ihe nkiri ahụ nwere nyocha dị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ ma gosipụta ya n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri
Ihe nkiri ahụ mechara merie Grand Prix Award n'afọ 2019 Cannes Film Festival.
Mgbe ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na telivishọn ZeroZeroZero na obere ihe nkiri Corruption
